title: Era of AI
article_details: The Era of AI has transformed the way we live, work and interact with the world around us. From self-driving cars to virtual assistants, AI is now an integral part of our daily lives. In this article, we explore the history of AI, its current state of development and its potential impact on society in the future.

title: Machine Learning
article_details: Machine Learning is a branch of AI that allows computers to learn from data without being explicitly programmed. In this article, we explain the fundamentals of Machine Learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning, and give examples of real-world applications of this technology.

title: Deep Learning (ANN)
article_details: Deep Learning is a subset of Machine Learning that uses artificial neural networks to learn from large amounts of data. In this article, we delve into the inner workings of artificial neural networks, including convolutional and recurrent neural networks, and showcase some of the most impressive applications of Deep Learning today.

title: ChatGPT
article_details: ChatGPT is an AI-powered chatbot that uses natural language processing to generate human-like responses to user queries. In this article, we discuss the technology behind ChatGPT, how it works, and give examples of how it can be used in various industries.

title: BARD AI
article_details: BARD AI is an AI-powered writing assistant that uses natural language processing to help writers improve their writing. In this article, we explore the features of BARD AI, how it works, and its potential to transform the way we write and communicate.

title: Human Vs AI
article_details: The debate over AI vs Human has been raging for years, with some arguing that AI will eventually surpass human intelligence, while others believe that AI will always be limited by its lack of human consciousness. In this article, we take a closer look at the strengths and limitations of AI and humans, and examine the potential implications of this ongoing debate.
